Key Match Events: Amen Thompson threw Tyler Herro to the court, sparking a brawl with over 30 seconds left in the Heat's 104-100 road win over the Rockets.
Post-Match Reflections: Tyler Herro had more words for Thompson after the contest, initially chalking it up to the physical nature of the sport before throwing one last jab.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The altercation resulted in four ejections for Houston - Thompson, Jalen Green, coach Ime Udoka, and assistant Ben Sullivan - and Herro and Terry Rozier were given the boot for the Heat.
Others: The Heat got the dub despite the intense altercation.
